title: Fact Check: Viral Video From Abu Dhabi’s First Hindu Temple?
subtitle: A viral video on social media claims that Sultan Sheikh Mohammad completed his promise to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and constructed first Hindu Temple. However, the video is actually from 2016.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim: A viral video on social media claims that Sultan Sheikh Mohammad completed his promise to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and constructed Abu Dhabi’s first Hindu Temple.
